title: Sound On: Waiting on Putin, GOP Blocks Raskin
itunes:title: Sound On: Waiting on Putin, GOP Blocks Raskin
description:
Guests: Tennessee Republican Senator Bill Hagerty, Ambassador William Courtney, Adjunct Senior Fellow at the Rand Corporation, John Sitalides, Geopolitical strategist at Trilogy Advisers and Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
